metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1353 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: none.  Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA.  Further investigation showed that it cannot be considered a security issue in the originally named product because of that product's specification.  Notes: none.

notes.Note: mdeslau> this doesn't actually look like a security issue

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
